Container.Name: FastAPI-DLS
Container.Overview:
Minimal Delegated License Service (DLS). Compatibility tested with official DLS 2.0.1. This service can be used without internet connection. Only the clients need a connection to this service on configured port.
Important: Fixed IP address Required (DO NOT USE BRIDGE OR HOST) DLS URL Required (https://xx.xx.xx.xx) Timezone Required (America/Los_Angeles)
Container.Requires: # Run This Command Below After Installing This Docker By Clicking. Start This Docker Again And You Are All Set! WORKING_DIR=/mnt/user/appdata/fastapi-dls/cert mkdir -p $WORKING_DIR cd $WORKING_DIR openssl genrsa -out $WORKING_DIR/instance.private.pem 2048 openssl rsa -in $WORKING_DIR/instance.private.pem -outform PEM -pubout -out $WORKING_DIR/instance.public.pem openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 3650 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout $WORKING_DIR/webserver.key -out $WORKING_DIR/webserver.crt
